example_sentence_italian: Abbiamo prenotato un ristorante per la cena.
example_sentence_english: We booked a restaurant for dinner.

example_sentence_italian: Ristoranti in città offrono cucina regionale.
example_sentence_english: Restaurants in the city offer regional cuisine.

example_sentence_italian: I ristoranti della zona sono affollati.
example_sentence_english: The restaurants in the area are crowded.

example_sentence_italian: Ho assaggiato i piatti dei ristoranti locali.
example_sentence_english: I tasted the dishes of the local restaurants.

example_sentence_italian: Ho letto il menu del ristorante.

example_sentence_english: We are going to the restaurant tonight.

example_sentence_italian: Ho preso il volantino dal ristorante.
example_sentence_english: I took the flyer from the restaurant.

example_sentence_italian: Ho letto una recensione sul ristorante.
example_sentence_english: I read a review about the restaurant.

example_sentence_italian: Hanno un accordo col ristorante vicino.
example_sentence_english: They have an agreement with the nearby restaurant.

example_sentence_italian: Ho telefonato ai ristoranti della zona.
example_sentence_english: I phoned the restaurants in the area.

example_sentence_italian: Prendo i prodotti dai ristoranti locali.
example_sentence_english: I take products from the local restaurants.

example_sentence_italian: Nei ristoranti italiani si mangia tardi.
example_sentence_english: In Italian restaurants people eat late.

example_sentence_italian: Ci sono molte recensioni sui ristoranti della città.
example_sentence_english: There are many reviews about the city's restaurants.

example_sentence_italian: Abbiamo collaborato coi ristoranti per l'evento.
example_sentence_english: We collaborated with the restaurants for the event.
